level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary amendment of section, see § 2001(c) of the Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-401, July 13, 1998, 45 DCR 4794), and see § 2001(c) of the Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-564, January 12, 1999, 46 DCR 669).
For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 2001(c) of the Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-41, March 31, 1999, 46 DCR 3446).
For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 1102(c) of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-144
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-144, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1219.01.

level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-169, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1217.11.

level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-175, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1203.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-312
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-312, see notes following § 2-1217.01.
